Docs.summary: The System.Data.Linq namespace contains classes that support interaction with relational databases in [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/add/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/add/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] is a technology that provides a run-time infrastructure for managing relational data as objects. For more information, see [LINQ to SQL](../Topic/LINQ%20to%20SQL.md).
